0: Several lampshades in the hallways were cracked and the rooms need a major update
I would say that the rooms carpet in some areas are showing some signs of wear and tear and could use some slight updates but overall the hotel is excellent
Had looked forward to the pool that is displayed on their website but found out after checking in that it was closed for repairs
I called the front desk to complain and was told that this was scheduled maintenance that would be going on all night and that there was nothing that they could do about it
It would have been nice to have known that fact in advance convenience to port arena convention center and riverwalk repair the swimming pool
Very disappointed but the Mariots pool area was very nice in the past and I am sure with the overhaul it will be even nicer
The elevators were under renovation which is why the review is not 5 stars
1: Beautiful Hotel great location pool outstanding unfortunately all the rooms were booked due to renovations Gaspirila Festivities so have to book early next time
My most recent stay I was in one of their newly remodeled rooms
They are constantly updating and renovating staying updated and keeping the rooms and common spaces looking amazing
They have renovated their rooms and everything looks very sleek and modern
I really liked the hotel the rooms have been freshly remodeled and were very quiet and clean
The rooms are recently updated with hardwood floors and enormous wall mounted televisions
The hotel went out of its way to make us feel welcome by among other things adding two bars in the lobby and adding a food station in the lobby since Champions is closed for remodeling
The room was updated sleek and had a beautiful view
As it has gone through a renovation the rooms are beautiful and the view I had of the water was beautiful as welThe staff was great Special thanks to Yazan at the front desk who excels at his job
Excellent staff and a beautiful renovation
